--- 1 November 2016 ---

2016-11-01: Demo Retired

On 1th November 2016 the demo system was retired. The DNS entry demo.steakconferencing.de now maps to 127.0.0.1.

For anybody to recreate the setup, the required configuration files (incl. SSL certificates) are now on Github.
